2184.subject: BUS
2184.descrlong:
Focuses on sustainable hospitality operations management. Emphasizes delivery of quality customer service. Students engage in data collection and choose a specific hospitality operation for an in-depth analysis. Topics include strategic decision-making, product and service delivery, forecasting, budgeting, measuring operational and employee performance, ethics, and technology. (Offered only in Spring, as interest warrants; sections may be offered as classroom-based, hybrid or online courses.)

[Prereq: BUS 304 and (Junior or Senior Standing)]
